Text: Daniel Abraham (author):  He is best known as the author of "The Long Price Quartet" and "The Dagger and the Coin" fantasy series, and with Ty Franck, as the co-author of "The Expanse" series of science fiction novels, written under the joint pseudonym James S. A. Corey.
